name: TradingTycoon
0:
”Alexa Open Trading Tycoon”
”Alexa Start Trading Tycoon”
”Alexa Ask Trading Tycoon To Buy Bitcoin”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trading tycoon
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Are You Ready To Become A Trading Tycoon Millionaire? We give you a portfolio of 100,000 Trading Tycoon Tokens and a position on the Filthy Rich Tycoon List to find out.

The aim of the game is to compete against other players from around the world to get as high as you can on the FILTHY RICH LIST. And just as in real life, as your wealth grows, so does your status!

Can you become the Filthiest Richest Tycoon on the Planet? Will you rise above the Apes, become a Master Of the Universe? Will you grow your portfolio 10X to trade your way to a million and achieve Trading Tycoon Godlike Status? Get there, and Maybe even Jeff or Elon will invite you to ride on their rocket ships! But be careful, don’t get Rekt and go bankrupt!

Gameplay:

Use the “BUY” or “SELL” commands to Trade these tokens against the * real-time prices of 5 of the most famous assets in the world: cryptocurrencies; Bitcoin, Dogecoin, and Ether, and stocks Amazon & Tesla. You can *buy and *sell as many trades as you like in a session to create your Trading Tycoon portfolio. Trading Tycoon Tokens in this game are pegged in value to the US dollar - but are totally worthless in real life. 

You can buy and sell any percentage of your tokens or assets - providing you hold some!

Use the "CANCEL " command to cancel a trade

When you are happy with how your portfolio looks, use the “HODL” (“HOLD”) or “Take My Position” command to set your portfolio, view the top five Filthiest, Richest, Tycoons and post your current position to the Rich List - only your wealthiest position will register as a new score - the only way is UP!

Use the “CHECK” command to either check an asset’s current price or check the current position of your PORTFOLIO or your RANK on the Filthy Rich Tycoon List. Check the Filthy Rich List at any time to post your updated wealth and status. Only your highest score will register on the list, so nobody will know if you are sinking into poverty!

Use the “RESET” command to start the game again as a newbie with 100,000 Trading Tycoon Tokens TTT

FEATURES: Use the LEARN MORE command to find out how to take a chance to bump up your token stash or buy status symbols to be rewarded for lockin in wealth. 

We now reward you for playing, with 100 Trading Tycoon Tokens for every minute you play the game. We've also added STATUS SYMBOLS and the Opportunity to get a quick boost up the Filthy Rich List by TAKING A CHANCE to increase your wealth by as much as 50,000 tokens. But beware bad things can happen to you too and you can lose your wealth and status just as quickly!

Don’t forget to come back later to see if your wealth and status have increased. Adjust your portfolio and remember two things:

The Stock Market opens and closes but cryptocurrency markets never sleep.

Good traders make money when the market goes up - GREAT traders make money when the market goes down.


IN SKILL PURCHASES:

This skill offers premium content, in the form of SUBSCRIBE to membership of the exclusive Trading Tycoon Club for extra opportunities to take a Chance.


STATUS LEVELS:

Rekt: <10,000
Ape: 10,000 - 99,999
Player:100,000 - 249 999
Hustler: 250,000 -499 999
Whale: 500,000 -749,999
Master Of The Universe: 750,000 - 999,999
Tycoon Trader God: +1,000,000

* DISCLAIMER: THIS GAME DOES NOT GIVE FINANCIAL ADVICE, NOR IS IT A FINANCIAL ADVISOR. IT IS FOR ENTERTAINMENT PURPOSES ONLY. PRICES ARE SOURCED FROM A COUPLE OF DIFFERENT SOURCES AND THERE MAY BE A DELAY OF UPTO 20 MINUTES IN PRICE UPDATES. ANY ASSETS TRADED IN THIS GAME ARE ENTIRELY IMAGINARY, AND FOR THE PURPOSE OF PLAYING THIS GAME ONLY, THEY DO NOT EXIST IN REAL LIFE AND YOU DO NOT OWN THEM. NONE OF THE COMPANIES OR CRYPTOCURRENCY DEVELOPERS ENDORSE THIS GAME IN ANY WAY. ANY POLITICAL HUMOuR BELONGS TO THAT OF THE DEVELOPER ALONE AND DOES NOT REPRESENT THE VIEW OF ANYONE ELSE. A TRADING TYCOON TOKEN HAS ZERO VALUE IN REAL LIFE. YOU CAN NOT SPEND TRADING TYCOONS IN A BAR!

GOOD LUCK!
